title: My Husband Texted The Wrong Woman
itunes:title: My Husband Texted The Wrong Woman
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, a few days ago, my husband and I went to his sister’s baby shower and I found my husband in the kitchen kiki’ing with a woman and he put her number in his phone. I went and introduced myself and she said she’s an old friend and it was good to be back in town. My husband walked off but I wanted to get to know her better. She told me she’s single and she lives in Dallas now, but she’d be in town a few days.....................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, a few days ago, my husband and I went to his sister’s baby shower and I found my husband in the kitchen kiki’ing with a woman and he put her number in his phone. I went and introduced myself and she said she’s an old friend and it was good to be back in town. My husband walked off but I wanted to get to know her better. She told me she’s single and she lives in Dallas now, but she’d be in town a few days.....................................
